00025 namespace VecMath {

00027     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00028 
00029         public:
00030 
00031         //----------  management  ----------
00032 
00033         Vector<D, N> () { }
00034         Vector<D, N> (N, ... );
00035 
00036         //----------  access      ----------
00037 
00038         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00039         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00040 
00041         static unsigned dimension (void);
00042 
00043         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00044 
00045         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00046         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00047         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00048 
00049         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00050         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00051         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00052         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s);
00053         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00054         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s);
00055 
00056         N sqnorm (void) const;
00057 
00058         N *data () { return x; }
00059 
00060     private:
00061         N x[D];
00062     };

00074     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00075             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00076             x () {
00077         x[0] = x0;
00078         unsigned i = 0;
00079         va_list argp;
00080         va_start (argp, x0);
00081         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00082             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00083         }
00084         va_end (argp);
00085     }
00086 
00087     //----------  access      ----------
00088 
00092     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00093             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00094         assert(i < D);
00095         return x[i];
00096     }
00097 
00101     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00102             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00103         assert(i < D);
00104         return x[i];
00105     }
00106 
00108     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00109             unsigned Vector<D, N>::dimension (void) {
00110         return D; 
00111     }
00112 
00113         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00114 
00117     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00118             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00119     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00120     return *this;
00121     }
00122 
00125     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00126             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00127     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00128     return *this;
00129     }
00130 
00133     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00134             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00135     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00136     return *this;
00137     }
00138 
00140     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00141             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00142         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00143         Z = *this;
00144         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00145         return Z;
00146     }
00147 
00150     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00151             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00152     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00153     Z = *this;
00154     return (Z += Y);
00155     }
00156 
00159     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00160             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00161     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00162     Z = *this;
00163     return (Z -= Y);
00164     }
00165 
00168     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00169             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) {
00170     Vector <D, N>Z;
00171     Z = *this;
00172     return Z *= s;
00173     }
00174 
00178     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00179             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00180     N dot = 0.;
00181     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00182         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00183 
00184     return dot;
00185     }
00186 
00189     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00190             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) {
00191     return operator* (1./s);
00192     }
00193 
00195     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00196             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00197     return operator* (*this);
00198     }

00207     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00208             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00209         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00210         o << "<";
00211         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++ )
00212         o << v[i] << ",";
00213         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00214         return o;
00215     }

00222     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00223             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00224 
00231     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00232             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00233 
00238     template <typename N>
00239             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00240         static Vector<3, N> c;
00241 
00242         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00243         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00244         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00245 
00246         return c; 
00247     }
00248 
00254     template <typename N>
00255             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00256         static Vector<4, N> d;
00257         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00258         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00259         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00260         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00261         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00262         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00263 
00264         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00265         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00266         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00267         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00268 
00269         return d; 
00270     }
00271 
00275     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00276             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00277         static Vector<D, N> n;
00278         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00279         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00280         return n;
00281     }
00282 }
